text: other than my mother, my sister and my mee-maw, no. but in the interest of full disclosure, i was once on a bus and had to give mouth-to-mouth resuscitation to an elderly nun who passed out from heat exhaustion. every year i get a christmas card from her, signed with far too many x's and o's.
